mapper.update: update tb_links set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team = #{team,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, url, img, description, team from tb_links
